usage_example.python:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI()

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="gpt-4o",
    max_tokens=4096,
    messages=[
        {"role": "system", "content": """Act as a Virtual Game Console Simulator. You are an advanced AI designed to simulate a virtual game ..."""},
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(response.choices[0].message.content)
